author: Valley City Times-Record
title: Realtimecampaign.com Appraises Bridging the Digital Divide with the Help of the Lifeline Program | User | times-online.com
text: The Lifeline program, a pivotal initiative in the realm of telecommunication, stands as a testament to the government's commitment to ensuring that essential phone services are accessible to all, especially the underserved communities. Established under the Federal Communications Commission (FCC), this program is not just a policy but a beacon of hope, bridging the digital divide and fostering connectivity in an increasingly digital world. Understanding the Lifeline Program's Core Objectives According to realtimecampaign.com, the Lifeline program's significance cannot be overstated in today's society, where communication is not just a luxury but a necessity. In an era where information is power, having access to reliable phone services is crucial for everything from job searches to emergency services. The program offers discounted phone and internet services to low-income individuals, ensuring that no one is left behind in the digital race. The Evolution and Impact of Lifeline Services The Lifeline program has evolved over the years, adapting to the changing landscape of technology and communication needs. It has shifted from being merely a means of providing voice services to also including broadband internet, recognizing the growing importance of digital connectivity in everyday life. This evolution reflects a broader understanding of what constitutes essential services in the 21st century. Private Sector Participation Providers under the Lifeline program, like enTouch Wireless , exemplify the impact of this initiative. By offering affordable plans and devices, they play a crucial role in connecting individuals who might otherwise be unable to afford such services. Their involvement in the program is a clear indication of the private sector's role in complementing government efforts to eliminate communication barriers. Navigating Challenges: Fiscal Considerations and Program Sustainability Recent developments have seen things like Wash. Justices weigh state tax on FCC Lifeline Program . This consideration brings to the fore the intricate balance between funding essential services and ensuring their affordability. The outcome of this deliberation will have significant implications not just for the program but also for the beneficiaries who rely on it for their daily communication needs. Addressing Operational Challenges and Future Prospects The Lifeline program, while crucial, is not without its challenges. Issues of funding, regulatory oversight, and ensuring the program reaches its intended audience are ongoing concerns. The program's effectiveness hinges on its ability to adapt and respond to these challenges, ensuring that it continues to serve as a lifeline to those in need. How to Access Lifeline Program Benefits For individuals interested in the program or seeking more information, a simple click here to find out more approach can lead to a wealth of resources. These resources provide guidance on eligibility, application processes, and the various services available under the program. They are crucial in demystifying the program and making it more accessible to those who need it most. The Lifeline program is more than just a policy; it is a critical component in the pursuit of digital equity. It represents a collective effort to ensure that everyone, regardless of their economic status, has access to basic communication services. As the program continues to evolve, it will undoubtedly play a key role in shaping an inclusive digital future. Media Contact Company Name: Realtimecampaign.com Contact Person: Media Relations Email: Send Email Phone: 407-875-1833 Country: United States Website: Realtimecampaign.com

author: Patrick McAvoy
title: Red Sox's Alex Bregman Reveals Which Team Boston Beat At Last Second
text:
Red Sox's Alex Bregman Reveals Which Team Boston Beat At Last Second
The Boston Red Sox struck gold in free agency right around the time Spring Training began.
Boston still needed a top-tier right-handed and certainly got one by going out and signing former Houston Astros All-Star Alex Bregman after months of rumors. Bregman is a superstar and was linked to a handful of other teams as well as the Red Sox.
Bregman recently joined "Foul Territory" and shared that he thought he was going to join the Detroit Tigers until the Red Sox swooped in at the last second and won the sweepstakes for him.
"We thought we were going to be in Detroit the entire time honestly," Bregman shared. "At the last second Boston kind of came in
This isn't too shocking. AJ Hinch is the manager of the Tigers and he clearly has a relationship with Bregman as he was the manager of the Astros as well.
It was a long offseason full of plenty of rumors, but luckily things worked out in Boston's favor. Bregman has looked like the star that he is throughout camp so far. He's going to give Boston a much-needed right-handed power bat, Gold Glove-level defense, and plenty of World Series experience in the clubhouse.
Boston said it was going to be aggressive this offseason and it was. Bregman is a guy who could be the difference between being a playoff-caliber team and being a World Series-level franchise. The Red Sox got their guy.
More MLB: Red Sox Phenom Has Unexpected Chance To Avoid Minor League Cut

author: Europa Press
title: Prueban la siembra en seco del arroz en el parque natural de Oliva-Pego
text:
> Los agricultores han implementado la siembra en seco para evitar malas hierbas y frenar la expansi√≥n de un hongo muy da√±ino para las cosechas Para el experimento se ha utilizado la variedad "bomb√≥n", que solo se utiliza en Alicante y que se ha recuperado despu√©s de desaparecer en los a√±os 70 El turismo y las malas cosechas reducen las reservas de arroz de Jap√≥n a sus niveles m√°s bajos en d√©cadas La asociaci√≥n agraria Asaja Alicante ha comunicado que el arroz de Alicante , cultivado en el parque natural de la Marjal de Pego-Oliva , ha incrementado la producci√≥n alrededor de un 50 por ciento respecto a la campa√±a anterior y ha apuntado que esta cosecha es "de gran calidad" .
Los agricultores han implementado la siembra en seco con el objetivo de evitar las malas hierbas . Adem√°s, la climatolog√≠a ha frenado la expansi√≥n del hongo 'Pyricularia oryzae' , principal causante de los problemas de este cultivo en los √∫ltimos a√±os, que afectan sobre todo a la variedad bomba.
M√ÅS Este arroz rosa creado con las c√©lulas madre de la carne ser√° un superalimento ¬øQu√© peligros supone para la salud comer arroz recalentado? ¬øHay que lavar el arroz antes de cocinarlo? Habitualmente, este tipo de maleza suele tener un crecimiento m√°s r√°pido que el arroz , por lo que consume m√°s recursos y disminuye el espacio de crecimiento del cultivo. La organizaci√≥n agraria ha valorado que esta siembra en seco ha resultado "un √©xito" en el 75% de los terrenos en los que se ha practicado por la "dedicaci√≥n y uni√≥n" de unos 200 agricultores minifundistas de arroz de Pego.
Variedad "bomb√≥n" Seg√∫n Asaja, el "bomb√≥n" , variedad que √∫nicamente se cultiva en Alicante , supone ya el 10% del cultivo total en Pego y la tendencia es que siga creciendo por ser m√°s resistente a enfermedades como la 'Pyricularia'. Esta variedad se reintrodujo en 2016, tras su desaparici√≥n a mediados de los 70.
Al respecto, Vicent Domingu√≠s, responsable de la sectorial de arroz de Asaja Alicante, ha expresado que la buena aceptaci√≥n que est√° teniendo el 'bomb√≥n' tras su recuperaci√≥n ha animado a quienes cultivan a seguir experimentando para poder plantar en el futuro m√°s variedades por si hubiera cualquier adversidad.
"Se est√°n realizando ensayos para volver a sembrar algunas variedades antiguas, como por ejemplo 'vialone', 'dellarole' y 'franc√©s', ha a√±adido Domingu√≠s.
La asociaci√≥n agraria ha destacado que el arroz 'bomb√≥n' tiene una "clara viabilidad econ√≥mica por su rentabilidad, calidad y adaptaci√≥n a un entorno natural en el que hacen falta menos tratamientos". Adem√°s, ha asegurado que los productores "est√°n satisfechos por la buena campa√±a".
Por su parte, el presidente de Asaja Alicante, Jos√© Vicente Andreu, ha aseverado que el proyecto que se est√° desarrollando en el arrozal de Pego va "m√°s all√° de una simple experiencia de ensayar nuevas variedades o recuperar una variedad tradicional". "Es un gran ejemplo de colaboraci√≥n y puesta en com√∫n de objetivos", ha concluido.

author: Ivan White
title: Odds Shifting in Oklahoma State's Favor Ahead of Utah Matchup
text: Oklahoma State is looking for a big win against the Big 12 favorite this weekend. Following OSU and Utah‚Äôs wins against in-state rivals to complete an undefeated nonconference schedule, Utah opened as favorites in the top 15 matchup in Stillwater. Opening as a 2-point favorite, Utah seemed to be in a position to make a statement against OSU. OSU being a 2.5 point favorite at home in a matchup of top 15 teams makes sense. However, going from an underdog at home to a favorite in a short amount of time raises questions. The shift in the Cowboys' favor was somewhat abrupt, essentially going from a 2-point underdog to a 2.5-point favorite overnight. Perhaps it means the oddsmakers know something about the status of Utah quarterback Cam Rising. After injuring his hand against Baylor in Week 2, Rising missed the Utes‚Äô game at Utah State last week. The expectation has been for him to return for perhaps the most important game of Utah‚Äôs season. However, there has been little confirmation about his status from Utah as the game approaches. While Utah‚Äôs coaches have said they are hopeful he will play, they have not given much about his status. Of course, that could be nothing more than gamesmanship, as OSU is having to prepare for both of Utah's potential starting quarterbacks. Considering that Rising has not played an entire game against an FBS opponent since the 2022 Pac-12 Championship, there is a general uncertainty about how he might look in a high-pressure situation. Regardless of Rising‚Äôs status, the Utes have many impact players on both sides of the ball who will give OSU problems throughout the afternoon. In the end, it seems that OSU will close as the favorite. Still, a last-minute update on Rising‚Äôs status could dramatically sway the spread again. READ MORE: Game Preview: Oklahoma State and Utah Set For Top 15 Showdown Want to join the discussion? Like Oklahoma State Cowboys on SI on Facebook and follow us on Twitter to stay up to date on all the latest Cowboys news. You can also meet the team behind the coverage.

author: Miyeilis Flores
title: Alimentos que no debes congelar porque pueden sufrir un gran cambio de sabor
text:
El congelador es un gran aliado a la hora de conservar alimentos , bien sea porque nos sobraron, por estrategia de cocinar para varios d√≠as o porque nos entusiasma la idea de tener comida para otro momento. Lo cierto es que para alargar la vida de algunos alimentos hay unos pasos que se deben seguir, mientras que hay comida no se recomienda congelar porque cambian el sabor y la textura.
La congelaci√≥n es una forma segura de preservar los alimentos por m√°s tiempo, ya que genera cambios sobre los productos alimentarios a nivel f√≠sico y qu√≠mico de manera que se detiene el crecimiento microbiano.
Hay que tener en cuenta que aunque se detiene el proceso de crecimiento de los microorganismos, cuando descongelamos la comida los microorganismos vuelven a reproducirse , por lo que hay que estar atentos a evitar toxoinfecciones alimentarias.
Por su composici√≥n, los alimentos contienen agua en alguna medida, por lo que cuando se congela, pasa a formar cristales de hielo. Los cristales ser√°n m√°s peque√±os de acuerdo a la velocidad de congelaci√≥n, mientras que cuando es lenta, los cristales son m√°s grande, como cuando congelamos en casa.
Relacionado 7 trucos que deber√≠as probar para almacenar alimentos Trucos para congelar los alimentos La congelaci√≥n alarga la vida √∫til de los alimentos. Cr√©dito: Shutterstock La Agencia Espa√±ola de Consumo, Seguridad Alimentaria y Nutrici√≥n (AECOSAN) hace 5 recomendaciones sobre c√≥mo conservar los alimentos
1) Por razones de practicidad recomiendan envasar los productos en porciones peque√±as porque esto permitir√° que la congelaci√≥n ser√° m√°s r√°pida, reduciendo las probabilidades de riesgos alimentarios.
2) Utilizar bolsas de pl√°stico puede ser muy √∫til, ya que permite congelar los alimentos con la menor cantidad aire posible. Es importante tener en cuenta que se debe usar una sola vez y dejar un espacio proporcional para evitar que los envases estallen una vez se congelen.
3) Utilizar el criterio ‚ÄúFirst in, First out‚Äù, es decir, lo primero que entra en el congelador es lo primero que debe salir. Por eso se recomienda organizar las bolsas o envases con las fechas para reconocer qu√© productos deberemos consumir primero.
4) los alimentos deben estar fr√≠os antes de introducirlos en el congelador, ya que si se hace cuando est√°n calientes se pueden afectar la temperatura de otros.
5) Evitar recongelar los alimentos, porque eso atenta contra la calidad de los alimentos y hay m√°s probabilidades de que se contaminen.
Alimentos que pierden calidad al congelarse Aunque congelar puede alargar la vida de los alimentos, hay algunos que pierdan calidad en cuanto al color, sabor, textura y aroma.
Papas cocidas : las papas puedes consistencia, se vuelven arenosas tras su congelaci√≥n, lo que puede hacer que no sean tan sabrosas a la hora de comerlas.
Huevos cocidos : cuando congelamos un huevo con c√°scara, este se expande y la romper√°. Adem√°s, la textura del huevo pierde textura con la congelaci√≥n. Una forma de congelar huevos es batirlos y guardarlo en recipientes herm√©ticos.
Los huevos pierden su textura y sabor al congelarse Cr√©dito: Shutterstock Frutas y hortalizas crudas: el proceso de congelaci√≥n y descongelaci√≥n genera una importante p√©rdida de agua y de la textura crujiente de ese tipo de alimentos. Una recomendaci√≥n que aplica en el caso de los vegetales es congelarlos una vez se hayan cocinado. Mientras que la fruta convendr√≠a triturarla para hacer un helado o un batido.
Salsas y mayonesa : las emulsiones que se forman al elaborar algunas salsas, la mayonesa o el alioli, al congelarse se pierden, lo que se traduce en que la salsa se corta, o deja de estar ligada.
Quesos cremosos: al llevarlos a congelar, el proceso de formaci√≥n de los cristales afecta la estructura del queso una vez que se descongela, ocasionando que desmenuce, perdiendo la cremosidad y cualidades organol√©pticas.
En el proceso de congelamiento los quesos pierden su consistencia Cr√©dito: Shutterstock Frituras: los alimentos rebozados y fritos, pierden la textura completamente al congelarlos, ya que baja de calidad organol√©ptica. Este tipo de alimentos pierde sus caracter√≠sticas crujientes.

4 formas de disfrutar frutas y verduras congeladas para refrescarte Aprende a congelar tus burritos con este truco para que lo disfrutes cuando quieras Ralla el queso mozzarella f√°cil y r√°pido con este truco

author: Zachary Draves
title: 2025 WNBA Draft sets record as 2nd-most viewed draft ever
text:
Even though fans criticized the WNBA for not promoting the 2025 Draft, the league managed to attract strong viewership.
The 2025 WNBA Draft brought in enough viewers to become the second-most-watched draft in league history, per ESPN. The draft averaged 1.25 million viewers and was the most viewed program across all television among the male 18-34 and 18-49 populations and the general 18-34 population.
The 2025
[#WNBADraft]on ESPN delivered the second most-viewed WNBA Draft ever, averaging 1.25M viewersüëèüèÄ 1.46M peak
üèÄ Most-viewed program across ALL TV among M18-34, M18-49 & P18-34
üèÄ Top cable program among M25-54, P18-49 & P25-54[pic.twitter.com/io5HdjpuSF]‚Äî ESPN PR (@ESPNPR)
[April 15, 2025]
The draft was defined by some notable highlights. The most obvious being the Dallas Wings selecting UConn's Paige Beuckers as the number one pick.
Other moments included the Seattle Storm drafting France's Dominique Malonga, known as the ‚Äúfemale Wembanyama‚Äù. There was also TCU's Hailey Van Lith being selected by the Chicago Sky and reuniting with her former LSU teammate Angel Reese.
This years draft comes second in viewership behind the 2024 Draft that shattered records with 2.44 million viewers. A draft that was defined by the selections of Caitlin Clark, Angel Reese, and Cameron Brink.
All this comes at a time of tremendous interest in women's basketball. The WNBA is seeking to build off their rocket riding 2024 season that saw increased viewership and attendance.
However, the league should do more in terms of promoting the draft better.
The WNBA Draft could use more hype
The increased interest in the WNBA draft is a testament to the growth of the game. So the league should do more to hype up the draft.
The draft is an opportunity to tell the stories of the incoming class of players. A time to chronicle their journey to get to the stage and learn more about their hopes and dreams.
In addition to the storytelling, the WNBA should emphasize the impact of the draft just as the NBA and NFL does. They should dive more into why the selecting of a particular player will help the teams dynamics and thoroughly break down the strengths they bring and the weaknesses they can improve on.
There also needs to be more hype about the draft way in advance. Television commercials, social media posts, billboards, etc. are great avenues to generate interest, but it needs to come ahead of time.
The WNBA is in great position to continue its growth and interest in the draft is part of that growth.

author: Chema Moya \/ EFE
title: Pedro S√°nchez tiene raz√≥n
text: 73 El problema central que se√±ala Pedro S√°nchez en su carta es que las derechas no han aceptado que perdiesen la moci√≥n de censura de 2018 contra Mariano Rajoy. Desde aquel momento esas derechas, en plural, radicalizaron sus discursos contra el nuevo gobierno progresista, que primero fue del PSOE en solitario y luego en coalici√≥n con Unidas Podemos y Sumar. Las hip√©rboles discursivas pronunciadas por las derechas no fueron meros recursos ret√≥ricos, sino una forma de activar, encender y radicalizar a sus bases sociales a trav√©s de la caricaturizaci√≥n y la deshumanizaci√≥n del adversario. Ambos son fen√≥menos peligrosos que se sabe c√≥mo comienzan, pero no c√≥mo terminan, y que, no obstante, se convirtieron en el arma central en la batalla por la hegemon√≠a pol√≠tica de la derecha. Aquellas derechas normalizaron el insulto hacia el adversario pol√≠tico, y envolvieron toda esa hostilidad verbal en un relato de una supuesta lucha patri√≥tica contra la Anti-Espa√±a. Esas derechas promov√≠an la narrativa, no precisamente nueva, de una noble batalla contra un enemigo interior que habr√≠a ocupado, con malas artes, el espacio de poder que siempre debi√≥ pertenecer a los espa√±oles de bien. Ante tama√±o desaf√≠o, pr√°cticamente todo estaba permitido.

author: Beatriz Nunes
title: Catarinense morre em ataque no L√≠bano: ‚ÄòFicaram embaixo da casa bombardeada at√© o outro dia‚Äô
text: Uma brasileira de 16 anos de idade nascida em [Balne√°rio Cambori√∫](https://ndmais.com.br/transportes/vai-votar-veja-como-ficara-onibus-dos-transportes-publicos-de-itajai-e-balneario-camboriu/), Litoral Norte catarinense, morreu em um [ataque de Israel contra o L√≠bano](https://ndmais.com.br/seguranca/ataques-aereos-israelenses-contra-o-libano-deixam-quase-500-mortos-em-um-so-dia/) ocorrido na segunda-feira (23). Mirna Raid Nasser saiu do Brasil ainda crian√ßa e morava no L√≠bano desde ent√£o. Os detalhes sobre o bombardeio foram relatados com exclusividade ao ND Mais pela prima de Mirna, Jacqueline Nasser, que mora no Brasil. De acordo com Jacqueline, o pai da jovem havia enviado a mulher e os filhos mais novos para a casa dos av√≥s em raz√£o do perigo que estavam vivendo. Ele e Mirna, ent√£o, foram para casa buscar pertences quando o bombardeio aconteceu. ‚ÄúAcordamos com as not√≠cias que estavam bombardeando, j√° tinham pessoas que tinham morrido na minha cidade. Entre 12h e 13h recebemos a not√≠cia do bombardeio da casa do meu tio. Eles estavam na casa arrumando as coisas para poderem sair da cidade‚Äù, disse. Ap√≥s esperarem o dia inteiro por novidades, Jacqueline recebeu a not√≠cia que o pior havia ocorrido: a prima e o tio haviam perdido a vida no ataque. ‚ÄúFicaram embaixo da casa bombardeada at√© o outro dia. Quando os bombardeios acalmaram um pouco, tiraram eles de l√° mortos‚Äù, lamenta Jacqueline. Segundo Jacqueline, Mirna tinha orgulho de ser brasileira. Ela era a √∫nica dos quatro irm√£os nascida no Brasil. ‚ÄúAcho que o que mais animou ela de ser brasileira foi na copa. Ela gravava v√≠deos torcendo pro Brasil‚Äù, lembra a prima. Situa√ß√£o √© tensa no L√≠bano Jacqueline diz que a fam√≠lia de Mirna pretendia voltar ao Brasil, mas ap√≥s a morte do pai e da filha decidiram ficar, uma vez que os corpos ainda n√£o puderam ser sepultados. ‚ÄúAgora ningu√©m quer ir embora. N√£o est√£o conseguindo nem chegar de novo at√© a cidade para fazer o enterro. Eles n√£o querem ir embora e deixar meu tio e minha prima sem enterrar‚Äù, explica. A prima de Mirna lamenta a situa√ß√£o que o seu pa√≠s natal vive. ‚ÄúEst√° muito perigoso. As estradas sendo bombardeadas, as casas. Minha casa at√© acho que n√£o est√° mais l√°. At√© eu perdi meu direito de voltar para o meu lar e meus filhos tamb√©m‚Äù, enfatiza. Os ataques a√©reos israelenses contra o [L√≠bano](https://ndmais.com.br/tag/libano/) deixaram, pelo menos, 492 mortos e mais de 1,6 mil feridos, incluindo crian√ßas, nesta segunda-feira (23). O governo brasileiro condenou os ataques e recomendou aos brasileiros que deixem Beirute, o Sul do L√≠bano e o vale do Beqaa. [Israel e o grupo Hezbollah](https://ndmais.com.br/seguranca/video-sul-do-libano-e-bombardeado-por-israel-apos-ataque-do-hezbollah/), do L√≠bano, trocam tiros na fronteira desde o ataque do Hamas e o in√≠cio da guerra em Gaza, no ano passado. Por√©m, na √∫ltima semana, Israel intensificou as opera√ß√µes militares no L√≠bano. O ND Mais entrou em contato com o Itamaraty, que ainda n√£o confirmou ou deu detalhes sobre a morte de Mirna.
